name: Biomagnet
description:
This game has only one difference which is player`s direction of gravity. So you can play easily this.


Explaination: The security company night shift employee walked through the ceiling due to a malfunction in the biomagnet.
Listen to the argument between the manager and the CEO, find out what happened.
Your goal is to escape the building safely.

There are 45 stages. There is a change in the direction of gravity in the middle, so be careful.
Try a new experience by solving some puzzles.



Biomagnet is my first work. Actually, I deleted a lot of function because I do not have enough time.
If Biomagnet attracts many people, I might make much fun and release advanced game.
